thread.title: President Trump Announces Supreme Court Justice Pick (LIVE STREAM)
thread.title_full: President Trump Announces Supreme Court Justice Pick (LIVE STREAM)

author: TMZ Staff
title: President Trump Announces Supreme Court Justice Pick (LIVE STREAM)
text:
President Trump Announces Supreme Court Justice Pick Prez Trump My SCOTUS Pick Is ... 1/31/2017 4:15 PM PST LIVE STREAM 
President Trump is set to reveal his Supreme Court appointee to fill late Justice Scalia's vacant seat ... and we're live streaming the highly anticipated announcement. 
That crucial 9th seat went unfilled through most of 2016 -- and Trump's SCOTUS pick is expected to be one of 2 men: Neil Gorsuch or Thomas Hardiman ... who are currently federal appellate judges. 
Both are also conservatives, but the question will be HOW conservative? That's why everyone's waiting and watching to see who gets the gig. 
It's scheduled to go down at 5 PM PT. 
Stay tuned ...
